about_the_game:
Viktor Crysworth - Digital Artbook with +20 pages from Viktor Crysworth's Creator, MISADREF (Management Information Systems Advanced Research Facility). Includes never before released texts. English and Turkish editions are available.

To access the Viktor Crysworth - Digital Artbook:

  • Right click "Viktor Crysworth" in the Steam Library,
  • Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files,
  • and Open the "Digital Artbook" folder.
detailed_description:
Viktor Crysworth - Digital Artbook with +20 pages from Viktor Crysworth's Creator, MISADREF (Management Information Systems Advanced Research Facility). Includes never before released texts. English and Turkish editions are available.

To access the Viktor Crysworth - Digital Artbook:

  • Right click "Viktor Crysworth" in the Steam Library,
  • Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files,
  • and Open the "Digital Artbook" folder.
legal_notice: © 2020 MISADREF (Management Information Systems Advanced Research Facility). All rights reserved. All other marks and trademarks are properties of their respective owners. Viktor Crysworth was made using Ren'Py Engine (7.0).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Viktor Crysworth - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: We recommend opening .PDF with Chrome for maximum performance
